I mean, all guys hate hearing about or seeing the one they're crushing on or are with screwing another man, that's the reason we all hate ntr, cause they make us feel for the guy who gets betrayed and smother it in our face. However, this one was kind of a complicated story. I don't expect that my guy wasn't angry towards the nympho for doing all she does and kinda playing with his feelings, even though she had feelings for him as well. But, my guy played the long game and he made it end in his favor. Obviously, we'd rather have a story that completely forgoes the ntr and other guys taking shots at my guys woman, but as far as stories with obstacles known as other guys go, this one is probably one of the better ones. The happy ending with no suggestion of further cheating is a pro. The fact the chick was open to my guy about her arousal at the end suggests that she ain't hoeing around anymore
